channel.title: EasyRSC messaging
channel.description:
Perhaps someone could point me in the right direction.
I'm trying to fix privacy settings on EasyRSC for private messaging. When a user has selected block private messages, I would like players who have said user on their friends list see the user as offline.
I can block the messages no problem, but I'm unsure as to how I can stop the client seeing the user as online.
I'm not asking for copy + paste, but if someone could tell me what files I need to edit and perhaps suggest some ways of going about this, then that would be great.
[center]Thanks, imALLin[/center]
Update: All done [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GAIHJds-oO4[/youtube]

item.title: EasyRSC messaging
item.dc:creator: @Methods Methods
item.description:
@Methods wrote:

Why didn’t you just use moparclassic to solve this? I believe easyrsc is one of the only sources with this bug

Read full topic

item.title: EasyRSC messaging
item.dc:creator: @imALLin imALLin
item.description:
@imALLin wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Stop making new accounts.

This is my first account.

[quote=“matty matt, post:3, topic:523322”]download other sources and look at how it is done in them and implement to easyrsc…
i will tell you easyrsc has major bugs that will break a server if you ever put one out running with easyrsc.,[/quote]

Well thanks for being so specific. I will tell you that I don’t plan on using EasyRSC, at least in its current form for a public server. I’m just using it as a development base to give me an idea of how RSC servers.

Read full topic
